headline: Compared to Estimates, Republic Services (RSG) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Republic Services (RSG) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Republic Services (RSG) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Republic Services (RSG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 15.33% and 0.86%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Republic Services (RSG) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Republic Services (RSG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 15.33% and 0.86%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Republic Services (NYSE:RSG) Misses Q4 Sales Targets
summary: Waste management company Republic Services (NYSE:RSG) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, but sales rose 5.6% year on year to $4.05 billion. On the other hand, the company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $16.9 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.58 per share was 13.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

Its non-GAAP profit of $1.58 per share was 13.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Republic Services: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Phoenix-based company said it had profit of $1.63 per share. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment gains, were $1.58 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: Republic Services, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Results; Provides 2025 Full-Year Financial Guidance
summary: Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG) today reported net income of $512 million, or $1.63 per diluted share, for the three months ended December 31, 2024, versus $440 million, or $1.39 per diluted share, for the comparable 2023 period. Excluding certain expenses and other items, on an adjusted basis, net income for the three months ended December 31, 2024, was $497 million, or $1.58 per diluted share, versus $446 million, or $1.41 per diluted share, for the comparable 2023 period.
